name: Erinye Demo
description: Erin arrives the town of Azuliris, following the path of a mysterous witch, who is rumored, carries with her a very valuable treasure. But Erin's quest is interrumpted when she finds out the town has been taken by a group of bandits, the ShyGirls.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 220 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel core i5 Memory: 4 MB RAM Storage: 220 MB available space
